title: New: XOV – Boys Don’t Cry
content:
XOV aka Stockholm’s (via LA) Damian Ardestani goes all out on his debut offering, Boys Don’t Cry.

Coming in somewhere between the slick R&B of The Weeknd and Drake, and a more outwardly 80’s pop inspired pop sound, it’s deliriously over the top, and resoundingly confident. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
